English: Use the <color=orange>PING</color> command to locate items in current zone
Description: Don't localize PING. It's a command used in terminals in the game.

French.Translation: Utilisez la commande <color=orange>PING</color> pour localiser les objets dans la zone actuelle.

Italian.Translation: Usare il comando <color=orange>PING</color> per trovare gli oggetti nella zona attuale

German.Translation: Nutzen Sie den Befehl <color=orange>PING</color>, um Gegenstände in der aktuellen Zone zu lokalisieren.

Spanish.Translation: Usa el comando <color=orange>PING</color> para localizar objetos en la zona actual.

Russian.Translation: Используйте команду <color=orange>PING</color>, чтобы найти предметы в текущей зоне.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Use o comando <color=orange>PING</color> para localizar itens na zona atual.

Polish.Translation: Użyj polecenia <color=orange>PING</color>, żeby zlokalizować przedmioty w bieżącej strefie.

Japanese.Translation: <color=orange>PING</color> コマンドを使って現在のゾーンでアイテムを探せ

Korean.Translation: <color=orange>PING</color> 명령을 사용해 현재 지역에서 목표 찾기

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 使用<color=orange>PING</color>指令定位目前區域中的物品

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 使用<color=orange>PING</color>命令在当前区域定位物品

name: WardenObjectiveData.RetrieveEssentialItemsMWP_Override.Custom.SubObjective
